page.title: 11Grampound Bowling Club
page.content: The bowling club in Grampound is quite a small one.It is next to the recreation field and has its own club house.The men of the club take care of the green.It has to be kept very short and watered a lot.The children in the village are very careful with the bowling green.If a ball goes onto the green you must never run to get it but walk very carefully and slowly across the grass so that you do not damage it.You can start bowling when you are 13.The bowling club is open every day from 10.00 till the sun goes down. Grampound Club plays matches against other Clubs from Probus, St Stephen, Bugle, St Austell, Looe, Fowey, Veryan.If the club beats all these clubs it goes on to play other counties.The ladies wear white skirts shirts and hats.The men wear white trousers and shirts.
